report.title: Отчёт для контроля разноса оплат
report.procedure: DECLARE p_dep kr_dogovor.dep%type; p_dat_opl_beg DATE; p_dat_opl_end DATE; s_data_id rr_temp.skod%type; BEGIN p_dep := :p_dep; p_dat_opl_beg := :p_dat_opl_1; p_dat_opl_end := :p_dat_opl_2; s_data_id := '{552F8089-A068-43AB-B165-E4B73500BA7C}'; -- DELETE FROM rr_temp WHERE skod = s_data_id; INSERT INTO rr_temp (skod, s1, s2, s3, s4, d1, n1 /* zadol */, n2, n3, d2, s5, d3 /* dat_opl */, n4, s6, s7, n5, s9, s10 /* raznos_type */, s11, s12) SELECT s_data_id, sf.ndog, ob.ndog AS opl_ndog, p.name, sf.nom_sf, sf.dat_sf, sf.zadol, sf.rym_max AS ym, d.num_pl, d.dat_deb, ob.num_opl, op.dat_opl, op.opl, ob.pname, op.remark, op.kod_type_opl, v.name AS vr_name, CASE WHEN op.kod_opl IS NULL THEN '' WHEN ob.raznos_type IS NULL THEN 'не разнесено' WHEN ob.raznos_type = 0 THEN 'неизвестный' WHEN ob.raznos_type = 1 THEN 'автоматический разнос' WHEN ob.raznos_type = 2 THEN 'ручной разнос' WHEN ob.raznos_type = 3 THEN 'автоматическая балансировка' WHEN ob.raznos_type = 4 THEN 'ручная балансировка' ELSE '' END AS raznos_type, decode(nvl(length(trim(b.filial)),0),0,'',b.filial || ' - ' ) || b.name AS bank_name, ob.u_c AS puser FROM sv_fac_sumo sf JOIN kr_payer p ON p.kodp = sf.kodp JOIN sk_vid_real v ON v.vid_real = sf.vid_real LEFT OUTER JOIN sr_debet d ON d.kod_deb = sf.kod_deb LEFT OUTER JOIN sr_opl op ON op.kod_sf = sf.kod_sf AND op.kod_type_opl IN (0, 1, 2) AND op.dat_opl BETWEEN p_dat_opl_beg AND p_dat_opl_end LEFT OUTER JOIN sr_opl_bank ob ON ob.kod_link = op.kod_link LEFT OUTER JOIN ks_bank b ON b.kodb = ob.kodb WHERE sf.dep = p_dep AND (sf.zadol <> 0 OR (op.kod_sf IS NOT NULL)) AND sf.kod_dog IN (SELECT kod_dog FROM sr_opl WHERE kod_type_opl IN (0, 1, 2) AND dat_opl BETWEEN p_dat_opl_beg AND p_dat_opl_end) UNION ALL SELECT s_data_id, dd.ndog, ob.ndog AS opl_ndog, p.name, NULL AS nom_sf, NULL AS dat_sf, NULL AS zadol, NULL AS ym, NULL AS num_pl, NULL AS dat_deb, ob.num_opl, op.dat_opl, op.opl, ob.pname, op.remark, op.kod_type_opl, v.name AS vr_name, CASE WHEN ob.raznos_type IS NULL THEN 'не разнесено' WHEN ob.raznos_type = 0 THEN 'неизвестный' WHEN ob.raznos_type = 1 THEN 'автоматический разнос' WHEN ob.raznos_type = 2 THEN 'ручной разнос' WHEN ob.raznos_type = 3 THEN 'автоматическая балансировка' WHEN ob.raznos_type = 4 THEN 'ручная балансировка' ELSE '' END AS raznos_type, decode(nvl(length(trim(b.filial)),0),0,'',b.filial || ' - ' ) || b.name AS bank_name, ob.u_c AS puser FROM kr_dogovor dd JOIN kr_payer p ON p.kodp = dd.kodp JOIN sr_opl op ON op.kod_dog = dd.kod_dog JOIN sr_opl_bank ob ON ob.kod_link = op.kod_link JOIN sk_vid_real v ON v.vid_real = op.vid_real LEFT OUTER JOIN ks_bank b ON b.kodb = ob.kodb WHERE dd.dep = p_dep AND op.dat_opl BETWEEN p_dat_opl_beg AND p_dat_opl_end AND op.kod_type_opl IN (0, 1, 2) AND op.kod_sf IS NULL; END;

views.view: SELECT s1 AS ndog, s2 AS opl_ndog, s3 AS name, s4 AS nom_sf, d1 AS dat_sf, n1 AS zadol, n2 AS ym, n3 AS num_pl, d2 AS dat_deb, s5 AS num_opl, d3 AS dat_opl, n4 AS opl, s6 AS pname, s7 AS remark, n5 AS kod_type_opl, s9 AS vr_name, s10 AS raznos_type, s11 AS bank_name, s12 AS puser FROM rr_temp WHERE skod = '{552F8089-A068-43AB-B165-E4B73500BA7C}'
